What time interval is used for the model output?

Definition/ Input Explanation: What specific climate targets are included in this scenario (e.g. 450 ppm, 2 DC, etc.)?
In what date (year) does the target have to be achieved?
Is overshoot of the target end date allowed?
Is there another target type included in the scenario? E.g. energy access, poverty alleviation
Please describe the target included.
Which burden sharing regime was assumed for this scenario?
Does the scenario rely on deployment of large-scale bioenergy with carbon capture and storage for emission mitigation?
Picklist options (Data Entry): no; not applicable; not specified; yes

Definition/ Input Explanation: What technology assumptions are included in the model (e.g., cost curves, lifetime, efficiency, availability factor and build rates)?
What assumptions are made for GDP growth? Name source or specify assumptions.
What assumptions are made for population growth? Name source or specify assumptions.
What social and private discount rates are used in the model for this scenario?
What emission factors are included for technologies of electricity generation and transportation? Name source or specify values.
What global warming potentials (GWP's) are used for different greenhouse gases? Name source or specify values.
After which year are no new policies or actions included in the baseline scenario?
